chunks.en: Bought a super comfortable pillow.

Bought a 40 RMB pillow on 1688, it's the best pillow I've ever used, better than the resin pillows I bought for two or three hundred RMB. The origin of this search was that I used a particularly comfortable pillow in a homestay and found the manufacturer and phone number on the label, and went directly to them to buy , if you search directly on the shopping website, you will never find this type of product. In 1688, there are factories that concentrate on producing the source of goods for a certain product, slowly look for them, there's always good stuff.

Suddenly and unexpectedly solved the problem of not having a comfortable pillow, and the first day I slept with a super high sleep score ğŸ¤£
I sleep on a buckwheat pillow now, and every night I punch the pillow to make a dent to sleep in.
A post single-mindedly advertising, being hammered from the first floor. A poster single-mindedly sharing, firmly not advertising, is being chased by everyone for a link hhhhhhh
Is this how soft ads are done now?

@lonhongg #107 The internet is full of soft ads, and it is difficult to distinguish the truth from the fake. The V station's top placement mechanism can also easily cause misunderstandings. If you question it appropriately, and then realize that it is a misunderstanding and apologize, if that's 'Red Guard' behavior to you, then I can safely say that you're good at exaggerating.

@xuxinglin8888 Tried it for a while, let's talk about the effect. Overall it's pretty good, with enough elasticity and good softness. Personally, I don't think it's a loss to buy such a pillow for 33 yuan. The slight shortcoming is that I feel that even the high pillow is a bit different from some hotel pillows.
I bought a comfortable pillow at IKEA before, for about 300 RMB. It all depends on luck to buy a pillow that suits you.
@marc2017 #20 I imagined the scene, it's too funnyğŸ¤£
Successfully lured me to spend 50.
@forest997 Does V station have a top post feature?? But I really haven't posted a post that's become so popular in such a short time.
Felt the power of traffic.

Those who suspect it's a soft ad, I've been registered for six or seven years, and this is the first time I've posted about pillows... But even if it's a commercial activity, it's nothing, as long as the product is good.
Parallel Desktop still posts and gets scolded every year, business is part of social activity.
I didn't force anyone to buy it.

chunks.en: Speaking of bedding, the beds at Westin and Ritz are really comfortable, the experience is completely different from mattresses under 5000, but buying from the manufacturer is just as expensive QAQ
@gimp @q534 #56 Then I misunderstood, sorry.
I guess the store owner must be depressed, why are there so many users placing single orders today, and from all over the country.
@forest997 #49 It's a bit 'Red Guard' in flavor.

@949n9 #116 Came back to write a review----Bought the medium pillow, in terms of cost performance it should be extremely high, it really has the feel of a hotel pillow, the fluffiness is enough, and it's quite comfortable to sleep on, you can try it. (But don't have too high expectations for something that costs 33 - anti-criticism)
Leave the keywords so I can take a look.
How would I know if you don't tell me? Tell me so I can buy one and try it too.
Link please.
@zhf883680 Can't advertise, right? The factory is in Nantong. From 1688, there are many pillow factories there.
You can look for them.
This is very personal. I found it after using a comfortable one, it may not suit you.
@KookSpookk @kyrieou Look above.
Give us a link or keywords.
